meanings.sent1: My kinswoman, Aunt Mary, always sends me birthday cards.
meanings.sent2: She is my closest kinswoman, always there for me in times of need.
meanings.sent3: My kinswoman, Sarah, is like a guardian angel, watching over me.
meanings.sent4: The bond between kinswoman and family is unbreakable, like a chain of love.
meanings.sent5: I cherish the memories shared with my kinswoman, they are precious to me.

meanings.definition: A woman who is related to someone by blood.
meanings.sent1: My kinswoman, Grandma Rose, bakes the best cookies.
meanings.sent2: She is my favorite kinswoman, always telling stories of our family history.
meanings.sent3: At family gatherings, my kinswoman, Aunt Jane, is the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: The bond between kinswoman and family is like a strong tree rooted in our shared bloodline.
meanings.sent5: I am grateful for the guidance of my kinswoman, she is my rock in times of trouble.
